characterDescription:
Axindweth is a surgeon with King Gavilar's group when they return to meet with the singers. She surprises Venli by being able to speak the singers' language.
Axindweth challenges Venli to restore the glory her people have lost by only having two forms when they used to have dozens. Venli argues that the old ways were dangerous, but Axindweth questions how wise her ancestors were and shouldn't she be allowed to make those choices. She hints that healing is a power to be recaptured making Venli suspicious she knows about Jaxlim's illness.
Axindweth leaves Venli a single blood red glowing gemstone that contains Ulim, telling her to take it into the storm and break it. "Inside you will find a path toward saving those you love."
